title: Rebecca0215
author: Rebecca0215
content: I just checked the dex are gaining more volume and popularity now a days like uniswap and sushi swap and don't forget The PCS and i just found an upcoming dex named OscarSwap they have a really amazing features and offering passive income for the users i think early adoption of OscarSwap would be great approach as it is on Arbitrium and have a less fees with the high speed transaction further the team is transparent, doxxed , KYced and the contract is audited from certik but now a days it's hard to believe in new projects so what you guys think should i have to take part in early stages of the OscarSwap or not as i am really scared of losing my hard earned money.website: https://oscarswap.com/Gitbook: https://oscarswap-official.gitbook.io/oscarswap-official/

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I guess you need to do your own research to avoid jumping on a hyped project that doesn't have long-term potential, this is very important to do in other to protect your investment in the long run.,  there is no doubt some projects have gained hype lately and even as there is so much potential to earn a good return on investment, it's very important to do a deep due diligence to escape bad projects, e.g some of the meme coins.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: I don't know much about the project but I get your point, this are starting to look up in terms of volume.  I'm gonna check it out because these platforms if not a scam are going to get a lot of play this next bullrun.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Rebecca0215 on May 29, 2023, 04:52:33 PMI just checked the dex are gaining more volume and popularity now a days like uniswap and sushi swap and don't forget The PCS and i just found an upcoming dex named OscarSwap they have a really amazing features and offering passive income for the users i think early adoption of OscarSwap would be great approach as it is on Arbitrium and have a less fees with the high speed transaction further the team is transparent, doxxed , KYced and the contract is audited from certik but now a days it's hard to believe in new projects so what you guys think should i have to take part in early stages of the OscarSwap or not as i am really scared of losing my hard earned money.-cut-You say it has less fees than uniswap? How does it have less when uniswap also offers Arbitrum to use? And can you explain the passive income thing. That's the only thing that sounds semi-interesting in here but i remain skeptical on that as someone gets to pay that income. So either fees are close to zero and you get no significant dividends or fees are high, which you said it won't be. So how does that work?

comments.author: timoshani
comments.body: Quote from: Rebecca0215 on May 29, 2023, 04:52:33 PMI just checked the dex are gaining more volume and popularity now a days like uniswap and sushi swap and don't forget The PCS and i just found an upcoming dex named OscarSwap they have a really amazing features and offering passive income for the users i think early adoption of OscarSwap would be great approach as it is on Arbitrium and have a less fees with the high speed transaction further the team is transparent, doxxed , KYced and the contract is audited from certik but now a days it's hard to believe in new projects so what you guys think should i have to take part in early stages of the OscarSwap or not as i am really scared of losing my hard earned money.website: https://oscarswap.com/Gitbook: https://oscarswap-official.gitbook.io/oscarswap-official/I think even if there is an opportunity to invest in this project, it is better to allocate not the entire portfolio for this. Let the profit be not so high, but some funds will remain for future projects. I would not now invest in this token, I would wait for the initial listing on exchanges like DEX.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: This question had been asked multiple times in this forum but not withstanding, this is a good time for us to invest in cryptocurrency to prepare for the bull market coming our way. Those who are buying coins now are the one that may make profits from the market because the price of Bitcoin is less now and there is hope that is will skyrocket soon.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Rebecca0215 on May 29, 2023, 04:52:33 PMas i am really scared of losing my hard earned money.If you're scared of losing your hard-earned money, you need to be wise in choosing what to trade and where to invest. I am not saying that the one you've brought is not actually a good one to invest but if you're not familiar with it, much better to find a better one.Quote from: timoshani on May 29, 2023, 09:09:13 PMI think even if there is an opportunity to invest in this project, it is better to allocate not the entire portfolio for this. Let the profit be not so high, but some funds will remain for future projects. I would not now invest in this token, I would wait for the initial listing on exchanges like DEX.Before all of those conclusions, don't forget to DYOR.This is the one that will make you understand that not all projects that have been brought up in conversations are good ones. But who knows if it's the one that will make you decent profit but again, who knows right?

comments.author: Teraboy
comments.body: just wait for better entry if you're scared of losing money, arbitrum is relatively new blockchain as far as I know and i don't know whether many platforms running in it gonna be successful.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Volume indeed is an indicator wto tell whether it is good to trade or not but so are trend, price actions and price direction. Perhaps with Bitcoin; in longer time frames it is bearish but with shorter timeframes. Contradictuons like this, is a warning that the market prices are moving sideways. On my end, I choose not to make a move as long as there is no clear trend. Ofcourse I would be missing some opportunities but atleast I won't gamble my money. It would only be rewarding if you will have the right guess but if it's the wrong one then goodluck. I think it would be better to wait for a little longer as this month is about to end and a trend might appear. But if you are that willing to still do so, atleast manage or make partial engagemrnts than going full in a single enter.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: best advice just seek some project that already established and even recommended from arbitrum team themselves i think there are many project that did partnership with the official team i guess, like many has mentioned, there has been history of some dapps that did scam, investing in newer ones just doesn't seem to be worth it over the risk of being scammed.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: Oscar swap is a bad token. Anyone must be DYOR before try to fall into the op's scam coin. Your advice to invest in the oscarswap coin has been telling us a club if oscar swap has not demand. That's why you are begging for people to invest in garbage swap token like that. If it's crowded with so many users and you will not beg others to invest in oscar swap here.

comments.author: deean_3one
comments.body: Yes, I think now is the right time for investment. The price of the coin is now going down. At the moment the market is in red. Indicates it's time for us to buy and invest then wait for the green color to decorate the market and take profits.

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: I think this is a good project. But I don't know much about this project and keep investing with your own risk. Every new project has a risk. But for me personally I will try to make a little investment there. I did not see the potential of the scam in this project. If there is someone in this forum who can give better advice I will be happy to hear it.

comments.author: Cvetik56
comments.body: The best time to invest is yesterday. The second best time to invest is today. You just need to make some research and think about your choices.

comments.author: woez
comments.body: Quote from: Cvetik56 on May 30, 2023, 07:56:11 AMThe best time to invest is yesterday. The second best time to invest is today. You just need to make some research and think about your choices.   . It looks like you are a trader too, keeping track of how the market works. good and continue to analyze so that profits increase, but the simple thing is for now, buy at a low price and resell at a high price on the same day. wait at most 2 or 4 days and smile. I noticed the dominant for this week like that. So, stay informed with issues that will become major topics in the world of finance.

comments.author: Desscount
comments.body: Quote from: woez on May 30, 2023, 08:38:47 AMQuote from: Cvetik56 on May 30, 2023, 07:56:11 AMThe best time to invest is yesterday. The second best time to invest is today. You just need to make some research and think about your choices.   . It looks like you are a trader too, keeping track of how the market works. good and continue to analyze so that profits increase, but the simple thing is for now, buy at a low price and resell at a high price on the same day. wait at most 2 or 4 days and smile. I noticed the dominant for this week like that. So, stay informed with issues that will become major topics in the world of finance.trading is like that waiting for a low price and selling at a high price, and right now we are still in a bearish season so there is still a good opportunity to own crypto currencies such as Bitcoin or Ethereum at low prices.

comments.author: Magic-Money
comments.body: Before you start investing in any Coin, have to undergo check about the coins, how long it has been exist and the plan of the platform being used and knowing the right time to invest base on the various price difference to compare the current price, that matters a lot for profit returns investment.

comments.author: raidarksword
comments.body: Never time the crypto market because no one can predict the market but you can speculate it though it is not guaranteed your speculations will be  on point.  The best strategy would be DCA, it's less stress for your part that's why always practice it. As the current market right now, during the bear market is the best to fill your bags of your favorite blue chip projects.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on May 29, 2023, 06:43:48 PMI guess you need to do your own research to avoid jumping on a hyped project that doesn't have long-term potential, this is very important to do in other to protect your investment in the long run.,  there is no doubt some projects have gained hype lately and even as there is so much potential to earn a good return on investment, it's very important to do a deep due diligence to escape bad projects, e.g some of the meme coins. Hyped are truly just there to make things hard for those who don't know what is truly happening in reality because everything they see is just a happy event and they don't know the storm that is about to happen once the hype is over. that's what the NFT fanatics think about last time they were buying expensive NFT products and others invested in some games that don't have any solid developers to support the game and they all ended up regretting their decisions because they wasted their investment and they didn't get the earnings from it as it didn't raise its price until now. so you really need to be vigilant when it comes to your investment in crypto so that you won't learn your lesson the hard way.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: Quote from: Rebecca0215 on May 29, 2023, 04:52:33 PMI just checked the dex are gaining more volume and popularity now a days like uniswap and sushi swap and don't forget The PCS and i just found an upcoming dex named OscarSwap they have a really amazing features and offering passive income for the users i think early adoption of OscarSwap would be great approach as it is on Arbitrium and have a less fees with the high speed transaction further the team is transparent, doxxed , KYced and the contract is audited from certik but now a days it's hard to believe in new projects so what you guys think should i have to take part in early stages of the OscarSwap or not as i am really scared of losing my hard earned money.website: https://oscarswap.com/Gitbook: https://oscarswap-official.gitbook.io/oscarswap-official/I advise you to tell the truth and not exaggerate or intentionally misrepresent what is happening in the market.The first thing is that I see DEX growing but whether it is competitive in terms of reputation or other things makes the difference always obvious, and the new dex environment that emerges today if there is no potential then very difficult to develop and survive.And next about the project you mentioned, you probably understand for yourself how hyped you are about it, indeed to me it is like one of the low quality and expensive DEX projects probably won't often or never use.
